description: Details required by condition nos. 3b (drawings of roof plant enclosures), 3c (drawings of windows and doors including framing and depth of reveals), 3d (paintwork colour for facades), 3e (details of scheme of re-landscaping works including all proposed trees/shrubs and paths and their surfacing materials), 3f (details of new artwork), and 3g (details of external lighting) of planning permission 18/01953 (Amendments to planning permission ref. PP/17/02481 dated 11 August 2017 for 'phase one' of Class B1 development) including two high level windows infilled, six infilled windows reopened, commercial space replaced with cycle stores and changing rooms, signage revisions, removal of handrail at Saga Centre, retention of fire escape stair, proposed plant removed and replaced with roof terrace and landscape revisions with new levels.)
